name: Collage
author: Joao
description:
The collage brush allows the user to copy and paste regions of the image, subject to the limitations of quantum mechanics.

The quality of the copy is controlled by the strength parameter:
 ğŸ”¹ Strength = 1 â†’ perfect copy, zero paste fidelity
 ğŸ”¹ Strength = 0 â†’ perfect paste, zero copy fidelity
 ğŸ”¹ Strength = 0.66 â†’ balanced trade-off (symmetric case)

Intermediate values represent different trade-offs between copy and paste fidelity.

Usage:
 ğŸ”¸ Click and drag on the canvas to select the copy region.
 ğŸ”¸ Click once to select the position of the pasted region.
